item.title: GPU usage information for jobs in IBM Spectrum LSF
item.description: In my last blog, we ran through an example showing how IBM Spectrum LSF now automatically detects the presence of NVIDIA GPUs on hosts in the cluster and performs the necessary configuration of the scheduler automatically.

item.title: A quick, hands on look at GPU "autoconfig" in IBM Spectrum LSF
item.description: It's been a long time since I've posted to my goulash blog. I've not disappeared, rather I've been writing articles for the IBM Accelerated Insights solution channel on HPCWire.

item.title: IBM Platform HPC V4.1.1.1: Best Practices for Managing NVIDIA GPU devices
item.description: Summary IBM Platform HPC V4.1.1.1 is easy-to-use, yet comprehensive technical computing infrastructure management software. It includes as standard GPU management capabilities including monitoring and workload scheduling for systems equipped with NVIDIA GPU devices.

item.title: IBM Platform HPC V3.2: GPU Management with NVIDIA CUDA 5
item.description: IBM Platform HPC V3.2 is easy-to-use, yet comprehensive technical computing cluster management software. It includes as standard GPU scheduling, managementand monitoring capabilities for systems equipped with NVIDIA Tesla GPUs.
